languages.text: "Не беспокойтесь, дражайшая Лорд-капитан, я и не думал быть голословным". {n}Хейнрикс достает инфопластину и искусно манипулирует системами устройства, пока не находит нужную информацию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не беспокойтесь, дражайшая Лорд-капитан, я и не думал быть голословным". {n}Хейнрикс достает инфопластину и искусно манипулирует системами устройства, пока не находит нужную информацию.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "You need not worry, dear Lord Captain. It was not my intention to bring up unsupported claims." {n}Heinrix produces a data-slate and skilfully manipulates the device until he locates the necessary information.{/n}

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « N'ayez crainte, chère seigneure-capitaine. Je n'avais pas l'intention de présenter des arguments sans fondement. » {n}Heinrix sort une plaque de données et manipule habilement l'appareil pour trouver les informations souhaitées.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, dear Lord Captain. It was not my intention to bring up unsupported claims." {n}Heinrix produces a data-slate and skilfully manipulates the device until he locates the necessary information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « N'ayez crainte, chère seigneure-capitaine. Je n'avais pas l'intention de présenter des arguments sans fondement. » {n}Heinrix sort une plaque de données et manipule habilement l'appareil pour trouver les informations souhaitées.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “不必担心，亲爱的领主舰长。我绝不会提出毫无证据的指控。”{n}海因里希取出一块数据板，熟练地操作起来，很快就找到了想要的信息。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, dear Lord Captain. It was not my intention to bring up unsupported claims." {n}Heinrix produces a data-slate and skilfully manipulates the device until he locates the necessary information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不必担心，亲爱的领主舰长。我绝不会提出毫无证据的指控。”{n}海因里希取出一块数据板，熟练地操作起来，很快就找到了想要的信息。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「心配は無用だ、ロード・キャプテン。裏付けのない主張を持ち出すのは私の本意ではない」{n}ハインリックスはデータスレートを取り出し、巧みに操作して必要な情報を探し出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, dear Lord Captain. It was not my intention to bring up unsupported claims." {n}Heinrix produces a data-slate and skilfully manipulates the device until he locates the necessary information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「心配は無用だ、ロード・キャプテン。裏付けのない主張を持ち出すのは私の本意ではない」{n}ハインリックスはデータスレートを取り出し、巧みに操作して必要な情報を探し出した。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Keine Sorge, {mf|werter|werte} Lord Captain. Es war nicht meine Absicht, nicht belegbare Behauptungen aufzustellen." {n}Heinrix holt einen Datablock hervor und beschäftigt sich so lange mit dem Gerät, bis er die nötigen Informationen gefunden hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, dear Lord Captain. It was not my intention to bring up unsupported claims." {n}Heinrix produces a data-slate and skilfully manipulates the device until he locates the necessary information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Keine Sorge, {mf|werter|werte} Lord Captain. Es war nicht meine Absicht, nicht belegbare Behauptungen aufzustellen. {n}Heinrix holt einen Datablock hervor und beschäftigt sich so lange mit dem Gerät, bis er die nötigen Informationen gefunden hat.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Pierda cuidado, {mf|estimado|estimada} Lord Capitán. No tengo intención de formular acusaciones sin fundamento». {n}Heinrix saca una tablilla de datos y la manipula hábilmente hasta localizar la información relevante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, dear Lord Captain. It was not my intention to bring up unsupported claims." {n}Heinrix produces a data-slate and skilfully manipulates the device until he locates the necessary information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pierda cuidado, {mf|estimado|estimada} Lord Capitán. No tengo intención de formular acusaciones sin fundamento». {n}Heinrix saca una tablilla de datos y la manipula hábilmente hasta localizar la información relevante.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Endişelenmene gerek yok sevgili Lord Kaptan. Asılsız iddialar ortaya atmak niyetinde değildim." {n}Heinrix, bir databela ortaya çıkarıp gerekli bilgileri tespit edene kadar beceriyle cihazı manipüle ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You need not worry, dear Lord Captain. It was not my intention to bring up unsupported claims." {n}Heinrix produces a data-slate and skilfully manipulates the device until he locates the necessary information.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Endişelenmene gerek yok sevgili Lord Kaptan. Desteklenmemiş iddiaları ortaya atma niyetinde değildim." {n}Heinrix bir databela ortaya çıkarıyor ve gerekli bilgiyi tespit edene kadar cihazı beceriyle manipüle ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
